top_comments.comment: I still love it how the best boss with the best music, aside from Bowser himself, can be defeated so easily like that.
You always cover stuff everyone else has covered.

Found out about #6 looking for a way to bypass level 6-7. My seven year old self somehow made it past a gauntlet of chomps, bomb platforms, and bandits, and yet failed to enter a pipe that was clearly the way out at the end. Kids are stupid, except when they’re not.

Fun fact: that Naval Piranha easter egg is referenced in Yoshi's Woolly World. In that game you can still throw an egg (or a yarn ball I guess) at it and Kamek will react the same way. But he'll still make you fight him.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I would try the Yoshi's Island trick on the frog boss because it works so well in the piranha plant boss but to no avail

So cool still seeing these videos being made, this was the first ever gaming related YouTube channel I ever watched, and fairly certain the very first channel I subbed to lol. Very first vid was the mario galaxy easter egg vid. Amazing to see you're still going. More power to ya!
